text: K&E produced its last slide rule, which it presented to the Smithsonian Institution. While slide rules continue to be made, especially for marine and aviation uses, K&E had been the dominant manufacturer, and this signaled the end of an era, and the rise of the electronic calculator.
The US space station Skylab returned to Earth scattering debris over the Indian Ocean and Western Australia.
Apple's second phone, the iPhone 3G went on sale, featuring 3G data connectivity.
